alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:33AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mitchell, southeastern Jewell and Osborne Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 233 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Asherville to 6 miles south of Cawker City to 6 miles south of Osborne. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Asherville and Simpson around 245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Beloit, Cawker City, Glen Elder and Scottsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
